Welcome to the Quiz App! Our app is desi: Welcome to the Quiz App! Our app is designed to help you study effectively by creating and managing flashcards. You can add flashcards with questions and answers, and quiz yourself to reinforce your learning. The app tracks your quiz scores to help you monitor your progress.
Beyond basic flashcard functionality, th: Beyond basic flashcard functionality, the app offers advanced features such as creating quizzes from lists and utilizing APIs for enhanced data management. You can also explore different categories with new questions each time you quiz yourself, ensuring a fresh and engaging study experience.
The app also supports language swapping: The app also supports language swapping between Arabic and English, as well as a dark and light mode to suit your preferences. The simple and user-friendly interface makes it easy to navigate and customize your study sessions.
